doc.title: Patanga
doc.plot: At the time of his birth, an astrologer had predicted that Raja is a lucky individual and would find his adult life surrounded by vehicles of all types. This prediction comes true when Raja is hired as a traffic constable. One day he gets distracted by a saleswoman, Rani, which results in a serious accidents. He is suspended without pay for one year. He looks up Rani and together they decide to try getting in Bollywood movies. They do find success with Producer Natharam Gope, and get some acting roles. Shyam finds himself getting attracted to Rani, but is unsure whether Rani likes him or otherwise. It is here that Rani meets with Shyam and both fall in love. But Purnima is Shyam's betrothed, and will do anything to prevent Rani and Shyam from getting married. Watch as events unfold that will both startle and tickle you.
